xwikidoc.title: SavePageService
xwikidoc.content:
#if($context.hasProgrammingRights()) #if($request.pagename) #set($tdoc = $xwiki.getDocument("$request.pagename")) #if($request.syntax == "XWiki 2.0") #set($discard = $tdoc.getDocument().setSyntaxId("xwiki/2.0")) #set($convertgroovy = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("MSOffice.ConvertPageGroovy")) #if($convertgroovy =="groovy_missingrights") $msg.get("RESPONSE 103 - groovy_missingrights")) #else #set($wikiContent = $convertgroovy.fromHTML($request.pagecontent)) #end #elseif($request.syntax == "XHTML") ## #set($discard = $tdoc.getDocument().setSyntaxId("xhtml/1.0")) #set($discard = $tdoc.getDocument().setSyntaxId("xwiki/1.0")) #set($wikiContent = $request.pagecontent) #end
{pre}#set($discard = $tdoc.setContent("$wikiContent")){/pre} #set($discard = $tdoc.save()) $msg.get("RESPONSE 0 - SAVE-OK"); #end #else $msg.get("RESPONSE 101 - The page does not have programming rights") #end
